Project.description: This project contains all things and services that are required by the Ewon Thingworx Connector.
Project.documentationContent:
Version: 2.0
Additional information and updated source code may be found online at https://github.com/hms-networks/flexy-thingworx-connector/
Project.name: EwonThingworxConnector

ConfigurationChange.changeReason: header : name : updated, description : updated, documentationContent : updated

Thing.description: This is a generic value stream that can accept and store the datapoints for configured thing properties.
Thing.name: GenericEwonDeviceValueStream

ConfigurationTable.description: Configurable options to tune Value Stream performance
ConfigurationTable.name: PersistenceProviderCustomSettings

Thing.description: The main service provider of the Ewon Thingworx Connector. This 'thing' provides the services required for receiving and processing data from the Ewon Talk2M cloud and the Ewon Thingworx Connector Java application for Flexy. The Ewon Thingworx Connector configuration can be modified by editing the properties of this 'thing'.
Thing.name: ConnectorHost

FieldDefinition.description: User context in which to run event handlers
FieldDefinition.name: runAsUser

PropertyDefinition.description: When set to true, all newly created properties will use 'Always' for the DataChangeType.
PropertyDefinition.name: useDataChangeTypeAlways

PropertyDefinition.description: True indicates that the tag name, up to the first hypen, will be appended to the thing name. This allows for a more refined organization of things and their properties.
PropertyDefinition.name: useHyphens

ServiceDefinition.description: Adds a new thing and app key for an Ewon device that will be connected to Thingworx directly, using the Ewon Thingworx Connector.
ServiceDefinition.name: AddNewDirectStandaloneDevice

ResultType.description: Endpoint and application key information for the generated thing.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: The expiration date/time of the generated device application key.
FieldDefinition.name: thingAppKeyExpiration

FieldDefinition.description: The user reference for the generated device application key.
FieldDefinition.name: thingAppKeyUser

FieldDefinition.description: The desired name for the new Thing to create.
FieldDefinition.name: thingName

ServiceDefinition.description: Landing function that an ewon can connect to
ServiceDefinition.name: TakeInfo

ServiceDefinition.description: Grabs all historical data from the DataMailbox then cleans all of the recieved data from data mailbox
ServiceDefinition.name: Talk2MSyncData

ResultType.description: returns usedTransactionId which is the most recent TransactionId actually processed and ready for deletion and nextTransactionId, the next transaction id to be called.
ResultType.name: result

ConfigurationChange.changeReason: services : AddNewDirectDevice : input parameter thingName added, inputs updated

services : AddNewDirectDevice : input parameter thingAppKeyExpiration added, inputs updated, input parameter thingAppKeyUser added, inputs updated, input parameter thingAppKeyUser updated, inputs updated, output updated
services : AddNewDirectStandaloneDevice : service updated AddNewDirectDevice : service deleted

ThingTemplate.description: The base thing template which provides properties and services for Ewon devices that have been connected to Thingworx using the Ewon Thingworx Connector direct data path, using a standalone endpoint for each device to submit data to Thingworx.
ThingTemplate.name: GenericEwonDeviceDirectStandalone

ConfigurationChange.changeReason: services : TakeInfo : input parameter Tags added, inputs updated, input parameter Tags updated, inputs updated
services : TakeInfo : service updated ProcessTimeSinceUpdate : service added properties : lastUpdateTime : added
services : TakeInfo : input parameter Tags updated, inputs updated

ThingTemplate.description: The base thing template which provides common properties for all Ewon devices that use the GenericEwonDeviceTalk2M, GenericEwonDeviceDirect, and GenericEwonDeviceDirectStandalone thing templates.
ThingTemplate.name: GenericEwonDevice

ThingTemplate.description: The base thing template which provides properties and services for Ewon devices that have been connected to Thingworx using the Ewon Thingworx Connector Talk2M data path.
ThingTemplate.name: GenericEwonDeviceTalk2M

ServiceDefinition.description: Sends the current Ewon device to offline mode using Talk2M
ServiceDefinition.name: SendEwonOffline

ServiceDefinition.description: Wakes the current Ewon device via Talk2M.
ServiceDefinition.name: WakeEwonDevice

ThingTemplate.description: The base thing template which provides properties and services for Ewon devices that have been connected to Thingworx using the Ewon Thingworx Connector direct data path.
ThingTemplate.name: GenericEwonDeviceDirect

PropertyDefinition.description: This is the name of the Ewon device as it appears in Talk2M. For Ewon devices connected using the direct data path, this additional parameter is required because the Ewon may have a different name or identification in Talk2M.
PropertyDefinition.name: talk2MDeviceName

ServiceDefinition.description: Sends the current Ewon device to offline mode using Talk2M
ServiceDefinition.name: SendEwonOffline

ServiceDefinition.description: Wakes the current Ewon device via Talk2M.
ServiceDefinition.name: WakeEwonDevice
